CustomField.formula:
IF( Region__c = Text($CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.SP_Quebec.Region__c) , CASE( Text(Contract_Type__c) , '112' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.SC_Quebec.Delivery_Email__c, '106' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.HL_Quebec.Delivery_Email__c , '110', $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.HT_Quebec.Delivery_Email__c , '' ),
CASE( Text(Contract_Type__c) , '112' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.SC.Delivery_Email__c , '106' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.HL.Delivery_Email__c , '110' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.HT.Delivery_Email__c , '' ) )
CustomField.label: Signature Delivery Email
